name: Bacche, firse!
wishText: I wish you all smiles, happiness, love success and all good things in life. Aur agar itni wishes ke baad bhi kch problem aye, toh I wish you have all the courage to face it and resolve it. CA Akanksha Garg ;)
text1: I wanted to do more, but..
textInChatBox: what's so special about today in 2024?
text2: July 19: Today is YOUR birthday! This year will be yours, trust yourself..
text4: Don't be nervous, because Baba ji is watching
outroText: Okay, ab rona mat, and it's good jo bhi hai.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
